name: DefiBids from Ethereum
description: Forked from Ethereum with Pulsechain. Bridged from Ethereum via https://bridge.pulsechain.com. Original Address - 0x1dA01e84F3d4e6716F274c987Ae4bEE5DC3C8288. DefiBids is a one of a kind decentralized auction site. Defi Bids allows users to bid on packages of existing ERC20 tokens.
